item.title: COVID-19 Data Monitoring
item.description: I recently began a project utilizing the incidence of COVID-19 in relation to other variables. In order to ensure my data is updated frequently enough, I wanted to have a method of monitoring COVID-19, real time, to see when any major changes occur. In order to achieve this, I built an interactive shiny app to monitor the data. To build my shiny app, I am defining inputs as follows: * country: the name of the country * type: the type of case (i.
